title: Ad Cloud Top Level Entity DataTypes
description: Ad Cloud Top Level Entity DataTypes

externalId.title: External Entity ID
externalId.description: Unique External identifier as represented by the network for the entity object.

network.title: Network
network.description: Network Name as defined by the search partners.

externalStatus.title: Network Status Code
externalStatus.description: Network Status Code of the entity.

creationTime.title: Creation Time of the Entity
creationTime.description: Creation Time when entity object was created

modifiedTime.title: Modified Time of the Entity
modifiedTime.description: Modified Time when entity object was created
